src.domain.controllers

Class CtrlDomain

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.domain.controllers.CtrlDomain

  • public class CtrlDomain
extends java.lang.Object
    CtrlDomain Class, it's part of one of the layers of the program. On charge of controlling the domain and data classes

      • swapSession

        public boolean swapSession(java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> from,
                           java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> to)
        Swaps the sessions of two MUSes and checks if the schedule is still valid
        Parameters:
        from - first MUS of the swap as String
        to - second MUS of the swap as String
        Returns:
        returns true if the schedule after the swap of MUSes is valid, false otherwise

        Moves a MUS to another Session
        Parameters:
        from - MUS that we need to move as String
        to - Session we want to move the MUS to, as String
        Returns:
